sn21.9:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā tisso bhagavato pitucchāputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn21.9:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno.
sn21.9:4.4: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ tissaṃ etadavoca:
sn21.9:4.5: “kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ, tissa, ekamantaṃ nisinno dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno”ti?
sn21.9:4.6: “Tathā hi pana maṃ, bhante, bhikkhū samantā vācāyasannitodakena sañjambharimakaṃsū”ti.
sn21.9:4.7: “Tathāhi pana tvaṃ, tissa, vattā no ca vacanakkhamo;
sn21.9:4.8: na kho te taṃ, tissa, patirūpaṃ kulaputtassa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitassa, yaṃ tvaṃ vattā no ca vacanakkhamo.
sn21.9:4.9: Etaṃ kho te, tissa, patirūpaṃ kulaputtassa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitassa:
sn21.9:4.10: ‘yaṃ tvaṃ vattā ca assa vacanakkhamo cā’”ti.
sn21.9:5.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
